block.p: BOWERY KITCHEN SUPPLY 460 West 16th Street (Chelsea Market); www.bowerykitchens .com

K NOWN for 25 years as a commercial kitchen supplier, Bowery Kitchen Supply not only is open to the public but has also started selling its wares online. Besides professional kitchenware and appliances, the store carries diner equipment like stools with colorful vinyl seats and chrome legs, above. The stools, also available with black or white seats, come in two heights: 26 inches for $39, and 30 inches for $45. The store also offers a vast variety of inexpensive restaurant soda glasses, sundae dishes and banana split boats.
